Job Description: Job Description     Lead a team of technical resources to implement websites and webbased applications using JavaScript and C# .NET   Support the creative and marketing strategy teams in delivering excellent enduser focused user interfaces and experiences regarding technical requirements and implications.   Help the company and its clients deliver industry standard or better code bases   Maintain and delegate backlog items to technical resources (software developers, data engineers and analyst, QA/Testers)   Drive clarity in requirements and generally keep the software development team unblocked   Delegate work and task to other local resources as well as participate in implementation.
